Interface HologramProxy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HologramProxyImpl

    public HologramProxy

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addLine(java.lang.String line)
      Adds a line to the hologram.
      <P> void addWatcher(P player)
      Adds a watcher to this hologram. Does nothing if already added.
      void remove()
      Removes the hologram. If it is not already removed.
      <P> void removeWatcher(P player)
      Removes a watcher from this hologram. Does nothing if the player is not aded.
      void setLines(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> lines)
      Changes the lines of the hologram.
